well i uh i don't know i had bought books for years and years and uh the last time i moved when i was transferred to Houston i uh filled up
most ladies do like mysteries a lot i have i have a friend too is a voracious history buff she just she reads one history

yeah i i pretty much carry my own reading material too i mean i'll uh i'll be walking to work i mean walking to the elevator to work and i'll be reading a book on the way up in the elevator and everybody laughs at me

yeah it's amazing to me the people that uh i've i've got a brother and sister-in-law that uh like whenever i go to visit them i'll always have to be sure and carry a book with me because there's nothing to read in their house and i go crazy
